text: George Albert Tootill (29 October 1913 – 29 July 1984) was an English footballer who played as a defender. During his career he played for Plymouth Argyle, Sheffield United and Hartlepool United. He played his last match in 1947 for Hartlepool. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People from Walkden Category:English footballers Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Alf Tootill (footballer, born 1913)
